Visit a landmark once without passing through landmarks b, c, or d. Then, visit landmark b once without passing through landmarks a, c, or d. Next, visit landmark c once without passing through landmarks a, b, or d. Finally, visit landmark d once without passing through landmarks a, b, or c.
